dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: The President of Kazakhstan is just taking it easy this week, right? No, actually, it's the complete opposite.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The President of Kazakhstan is just taking it easy this week, right? No, actually, it's the complete opposite.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President's schedule for the upcoming week is quite full, with meetings with foreign guests and official events, according to the Akorda press service.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, not at all. I mean, just look at May 28th and 29th. President Paul Kagame of Rwanda is coming for an official visit, and they're planning to sign a bunch of documents.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, not at all. I mean, just look at May twenty eighth and twenty ninth. President Paul Kagame of Rwanda is coming for an official visit, and they're planning to sign a bunch of documents.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 28–29 – President of Rwanda Paul Kagame will pay an official visit to Kazakhstan. During the visit, prospects for developing bilateral cooperation will be discussed, and a number of documents will be signed.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and that's just the start. On that same day, he's also meeting with Anke Rehlinger, the President of the Bundesrat from Germany. It's a packed day.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and that's just the start. On that same day, he's also meeting with Anke Rehlinger, the President of the Bundesrat from Germany. It's a packed day.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 28 – A meeting will be held with the President of the Bundesrat of the Federal Republic of Germany, Anke Rehlinger.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And then, uh, also on those dates, the President of North Macedonia, Gordana Siljanovska-Davkova, is making a working visit. That's a lot of diplomatic traffic at once.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, uh, also on those dates, the President of North Macedonia, Gordana Siljanovska-Davkova, is making a working visit. That's a lot of diplomatic traffic at once.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 28–29 – President of North Macedonia Gordana Siljanovska-Davkova will make a working visit to Kazakhstan.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Don't forget the Croatian Prime Minister, Andrej Plenkovic, is also heading to Astana around the same time. It's like a European leader convention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Don't forget the Croatian Prime Minister, Andrej Plenkovic, is also heading to Astana around the same time. It's like a European leader convention.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 28–29 – Croatian Prime Minister Andrej Plenkovic will pay a working visit to Astana.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Then on the 29th, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev is participating in the Astana International Forum. He's gonna be meeting with all sorts of big names from companies and international groups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Then on the twenty ninth, Kassym-Jomart Tokayev is participating in the Astana International Forum. He's gonna be meeting with all sorts of big names from companies and international groups.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 29 – Kassym-Jomart Tokayev will participate in the Astana International Forum (AIF) and hold several meetings with heads of official delegations, leaders of international organizations, and companies.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then, uh, Giorgia Meloni, the Italian Prime Minister, arrives on the 30th for an official visit. That's a major one.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then, uh, Giorgia Meloni, the Italian Prime Minister, arrives on the thirtieth for an official visit. That's a major one.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 30 – Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni will visit Kazakhstan on an official visit.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and that same day they're holding the first ever Central Asia-Italy summit. That's a huge deal for regional diplomacy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and that same day they're holding the first ever Central Asia-Italy summit. That's a huge deal for regional diplomacy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On the same day, the first Central Asia–Italy summit will be held in Astana with the participation of the heads of state of the region.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And then it wraps up on the 31st with the President attending an event for the Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Political Repressions and Famine.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And then it wraps up on the thirty first with the President attending an event for the Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Political Repressions and Famine.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: May 31 – The President will take part in an event dedicated to the Day of Remembrance of the Victims of Political Repressions and Famine.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: So yeah, definitely not a light week. It's like a marathon of meetings and summits.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So yeah, definitely not a light week. It's like a marathon of meetings and summits.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. It really shows how active Kazakhstan is on the global stage right now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. It really shows how active Kazakhstan is on the global stage right now.
